channel.title: UIViewController on I make stuff
channel.description: Recent content in UIViewController on I make stuff

item.title: How to generate a NSViewController without a Nib?
item.description: In the last days, I created all the ViewControllers through the storyboard or the Nib (for views). Today, when I created a demo project without any Nib file, the ViewController did not show as I expected. WTF, Can you believe that? I cannot even create a ViewController now. There exist some differences between iOS and macOS. iOS In the previous development on the iOS platform, create a ViewController, specifically UIViewController instance, is dead simple as below.
